name: Node.js
notes: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime for server-side programming.

name: nvm
notes: nvm is a version manager for Node.js, allowing you to install and switch between multiple versions of Node.js.

name: PostgreSQL
notes: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open-source relational database system.

name: MySQL
notes: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system.

name: MongoDB
notes: MongoDB is a NoSQL database for modern application development.

name: Redis
notes: Redis is an in-memory key-value store for caching and message brokering.

name: Docker
notes: Docker is a platform for containerizing applications.

name: Kubernetes
notes: Kubernetes is a container orchestration platform.

name: Git
notes: Git is a distributed version control system.

name: Golang
notes: Golang (Go) is a statically typed programming language designed for backend development.

name: Visual Studio Code (VS Code)
notes: VS Code is a lightweight, highly customizable code editor.

name: Vim
notes: Vim is a highly configurable text editor for efficient coding.

name: k9s
notes: k9s is a terminal UI for managing Kubernetes clusters.

name: GitHub CLI (gh)
notes: GitHub CLI provides a command-line interface for interacting with GitHub.

name: cURL
notes: cURL is a command-line tool for making HTTP requests.

name: Postman
notes: Postman is an API testing tool.

name: nginx
notes: nginx is a high-performance HTTP server and reverse proxy.

name: Elasticsearch
notes: Elasticsearch is a distributed search and analytics engine.

name: K6
notes: K6 is a performance testing tool for modern web apps.

name: Vegeta
notes: Vegeta is a load testing tool for HTTP services.

name: OpenSSL
notes: OpenSSL is a toolkit for SSL and TLS protocols.

name: jq
notes: jq is a lightweight command-line JSON processor.

name: HTTPie
notes: HTTPie is a user-friendly HTTP client for the terminal.

name: asciinema
notes: asciinema records and shares terminal sessions.

name: Swagger CLI
notes: Swagger CLI is a tool for validating and bundling OpenAPI specifications.

name: Terraform
notes: Terraform is an Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tool.

name: yq
notes: yq is a lightweight and portable command-line YAML processor, similar to jq for JSON.
